name: Roaming Village
description: Roaming Village is a game about trading resources and trying to end on a high. The player controls a village with the ability to teleport to a new area using crystals. Balancing food, valuables, crystals, people and energy, the player can roam from place to place making trades and acquiring resources. The player chooses when to settle down - will you leave your village poor, starving and stranded or prepared for the future?
